title: Berberis jujuyensis
summary: Berberis jujuyensis is a shrub in the Berberidaceae described as a species in 1953. It is native to Jujuy Province in northwestern Argentina and to nearby Tarija region of Bolivia.
content:
Berberis jujuyensis is a shrub in the Berberidaceae described as a species in 1953. It is native to Jujuy Province in northwestern Argentina and to nearby Tarija region of Bolivia.
